verses.roman:
ācambite eka gopa vaṁśī bājāila
śuni' mahāprabhura mahā-premāveśa haila

synonyms: ācambite—suddenly; eka gopa—one cowherd boy; vaṁśī—flute; bājāila—blew; śuni'-hearing; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mahā-prema-āveśa—absorption in great ecstatic love; haila—there was.
translation: Suddenly a cowherd boy blew on his flute, and immediately the Lord was struck with ecstatic love.
